name: Flora (itch) (ashashza)
description:
Flora

Grow your forest, avoid fires.

Made in 48h for Miz Jam.


Making of

Saw this pack...

Sturdy square tree caught my eye...

What would it be like to be a forest?

* not exactly what it's like to be a forest

If you're a forest... fires can be grim...

* grim confirmed

Thanks for playing & reading!
